This site

04 March 2020

This website has been generated with jekyll using the duet theme and is hosted for free on github pages.

These tutorials were extremely useful in getting set up - a million thanks to the authors.

  • https://programminghistorian.org/en/lessons/building-static-sites-with-jekyll-github-pages
  • https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2014/08/build-blog-jekyll-github-pages/
  • http://jmcglone.com/guides/github-pages/
  • https://medium.com/20percentwork/creating-your-blog-for-free-using-jekyll-github-pages-dba37272730a
  • https://pages.github.com/

Other useful free themes to consider for design portfolio sites are:

  • https://github.com/samesies/barber-jekyll
  • https://github.com/LeNPaul/portfolio-jekyll-theme
  • https://github.com/LeNPaul/Millennial

Additional premium portfolio themes that were considered:

  • https://made.jekyllthemes.io/
  • https://index.jekyllthemes.io/
